properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 7 at 3:58AM EST until February 7 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow
accumulations of 5 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a
light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Bradford county.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility this afternoon. Scattered power
outages possible this afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain and freezing rain occurs early this
morning, but changes to accumulating snow between 7 AM and 10
AM. Snowfall rates may exceed 2 inches per hour at times this
morning. Snow diminishes in afternoon, but gusty northwest winds
will cause blowing snow. The combination of winds, with weight
of new snow and ice, may lead to some power outages.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorist to heed all
travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit
www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic
conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
